name: Troubles in the Petri
description:
The goal of the game is to find and  eliminate the killing virus which was introduced in your  petri dish . 

The only way to recognize it is by watching carefully after the tainted victims: only the killer can kill the other cells. When you think you found it, Zap it! (click with the mouse to release an precise and powerful laser with uncommon sound)

You can shot multiple suspects, but remember your grade will depend on the remaining living cells in the culture.

...Will you get a A grade in Pasteur mode?

---

A game created for the TriJam#96 (theme: Microbiology).

For our second participation we were able to finish within the time limit! We worked in a team of 2:

  • Vincent: graphics & audio on PSP  - 2h50
  • Pierre: development on Unity - 3h00

All assets were created during the jam, except for:

  •  font Digital-7 (freeware)
